capture-filter
**************


Description
===========

A capture filter contains a set of *`rules <https://docs.cloud.oracle
.com/api/#/en/iaas/latest/datatypes/CaptureFilterRuleDetails>`__*
governing what traffic is mirrored for a *`VTAP
<https://docs.cloud.oracle.com/api/#/en/iaas/latest/Vtap>`__* or
captured for a *`VCN Flow Log
<https://docs.cloud.oracle.com/iaas/Content/Network/Concepts/vcn-flow-
logs.htm>`__*. The capture filter is created with no rules defined,
and it must have at least one rule to mirror traffic for the VTAP or
collect VCN flow logs.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* get

* list

* update
